event: Toby and Cal stick by each other after Wayne dies, even when they both feel lost and angry.
motto: Hard challenges show the truth real relationship of the friends

event: Toby's mother traveled to Nashville, to achieve his dream to song, but that made Toby feeling bad and depressed because there is no anyone to be kind with him
motto: Dreams to be achieved needs some sacrifices

event: Zakary is called 'The fatest person' but he was so kind and patient ( Better than other people )
motto: Repulations are not the determiners who the person is

event: Zackary was alone in the town at first, but he became friend with Toby and Cal ( He finds himself loving Toby and Cal )
motto: Every person should have people he loves them and belongs to

event: Toby faced a lot of challenges like Family changes, and the bad fear feelings, but he was helping Zakary and works with resturants, and mowing grass ( he was strong )
motto: Challenges teaches the person to be stronger

event: Toby and Cal helped Zakary by getting him food and talk with him ( sit with him ), which built trust between them and the community
motto: Favours and being kind with the others make a feeling, repulation, and greate legacy

event: Toby has bad feelings all of the story, but no one noticed that from his friends
motto: Every person has hidden feelings or ideas that is hard to be shown

event: Toby, Cal and Zakary found themselves helping each other whatever the thing is
motto: Family can be chosen, not your brothers or sisters only

event: Toby and Cal became friends with Zakary but he is fat and ugly
motto: The appearance of the body of a person doesn't matter ( Because its Allah creation ) the important thing is the behavior

event: Toby thinks and remembers the beautiful moments with his mother, makes him stronger to do the impossible
motto: The beautiful memories is essential to get stronger
